item.title: ANAVEX LIFE SCIENCES CORP 10-K
item.description: ANAVEX LIFE SCIENCES CORP, which is in the Biological Products (No Diagnostic Substances) [2836] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 28, 2022 had 30466 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 431 instances clinical - 288 instances anavex - 259 instances drug - 237 instances 2 - 215 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
